title: Where do I go to ask for a replacement case? Mine arrived with a stitch mark.
content:
Hi,

I bought the Pixel 3a and part of the deal was to receive the original Pixel 3a case. I did and I really like it but it is damaged! There's a stitch in the top left corner and I'm worried it might start to get worse over time. 

However I can't see were to start a case to get it replace! This web page is very hard to navigate thru.

Where could I start a case to get this going?

Thanks.
